title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 87.8 - Operational period
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 87.8 - Operational period

State Regulations
(a) A nursing home company shall be operated in accordance with the requirements of the State Hospital Code. (b) The operational period shall commence on the financial occupancy date declared by the State Commissioner of Health. (c) All company records, reports and schedules required during initial occupancy shall be maintained during the operational period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
87.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
